price: Kuma daga waɗanda suka ce: "Lalle ne mu Nasãra ne" Mun riƙi alkawarinsu, sai suka manta da wani yanki daga abin da aka tunãtar da su da shi, sai Muka shushuta adãwa da ƙeta a tsakãninsu har ya zuwa ga Rãnar ¡iyãma. Kuma Allah zai bã su lãbari da abin da suka kasance sunã sanã'antawa.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا نَصَٰرَىٰٓ أَخَذۡنَا مِيثَٰقَهُمۡ فَنَسُواْ حَظّٗا مِّمَّا ذُكِّرُواْ بِهِۦ فَأَغۡرَيۡنَا بَيۡنَهُمُ ٱلۡعَدَاوَةَ وَٱلۡبَغۡضَآءَ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ وَسَوۡفَ يُنَبِّئُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَصۡنَعُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamina alladhīna qālū innā naṣārā akhadhnā mīthāqahum fanasū ḥaẓẓan mimmā dhukkirū bihi fa-aghraynā baynahumu al-ʿadāwata wal-baghḍāa ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati wasawfa yunabbi-uhumu al-lahu bimā kānū yaṣnaʿūna
